file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-25-01-05 - AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the check of the toilet waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY TOILET WASTE AUTO FIRE EXTINGUISH- ALL 26-25-01-720-801-A ♦ ER BOTTLE - WEIGHT CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-25-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-25-01-720-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. TOILET WASTE AUTO FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - WEIGHT CHECK A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the check of the weight of the toilet-waste auto-fire- extinguisher bottle. (2) To do the inspection, it is necessary to remove the toilet-waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle from the aircraft. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 26-25-01-000-801-A/400 AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER - REMOVAL AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER - INSTALLA- AMM TASK 26-25-01-400-801-A/400 TION CMM ATA 26-25-12 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Toilet I. Preparation SUBTASK 840-002-A (1) Remove the toilet-waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle ( AMM TASK 26-25-01-000-801- A/400) J. Toilet-Waste Auto-Fire-Extinguisher Bottle - Weight Inspection SUBTASK 280-002-A (1) Weigh the toilet-waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle. Refer to the last revision of CMM ATA 26-25-12 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 720-801-A/500 26-25-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 840-003-A (1) Install the toilet-waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle ( AMM TASK 26-25-01-400-801-A/ 400) EMB-145 - AMM 1285 720-801-A/500 26-25-01 Page 3 of 3 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
